# frequentPushesEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether a person permitted you to update Live Activities with frequent ActivityKit push notifications.

## Declaration

```swift
final var frequentPushesEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Observing availability of frequent ActivityKit push notifications

- **frequentPushEnablementUpdates**: An asynchronous sequence you use to observe whether a person permitted you to update Live Activities with frequent ActivityKit push notifications.
- **ActivityAuthorizationInfo.FrequentPushEnablementUpdates**: A structure that can observe whether you can update Live Activities with frequent ActivityKit push notifications.
